title: Request regarding rune pages
body:
Any chance of getting an option to sort your rune pages / masteries? 
Like a click and drag sort of thing? or even a "Tag" so you can tag them? eg. "JG" "AD" "AP" and have your different rune variations under tidy tags? 
idk, ty
{{champion:103}}-S-P-E-C-T

replies.body: Um. You can name them. What more do you need?

> [{quoted}](name=DW Aatrox,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=epEVftxO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-16T12:18:56.518+0000)
>
> Um. You can name them. What more do you need?

yeah this lmao.
also naming your rune pages after what role they're used for is for scrubs anyway. you should just be able to remember what they're called off the top of your head.
